action.name: Set text
action.param: "The colder the room is, the more blue it becomes"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Open blinds in sunny weather can warm up the room"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Tap the blinds to open it and warm the room"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "But if the weather is cloudy, heat will escape"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Tap the blinds again to close it and retain heat"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "If a person is too cold, they will raise the heat and use more energy"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Save energy by making sure the people do not have to increase the heat"

sub-events.comment: Player opening and closing the window
Changes in Room temperature due to different factors
If not dead end, set path to new room
When the weather changes from sun to cloudy, or vice versa
When the window is opened or closed

event-group.title: M7 Check Temperature of Each Person

sub-events.comment: Automatically end game if thermostat set too high
If the person is in a room under -1 degrees, increase the thermostat
Trigger to start the increase temperature transition: function (person.UID)

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Now keep the people warm in the other difficulties!"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "The people stayed warm without raising the temperature."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "The people stayed warm, but had raised the temperature by " & (M7_Temperature - 18) &"degrees."
